overview: Mystery and murder are bad enough. But when your underworld boss is Death herself? Well, you might end up using methods to solve the supernatural. With a pink latex Bunny for a sidekick, Natalia laces up her ass kicking boots and gets to work saving the world. She'll fuck and suck until it goes down in fireworks - and like a good boss she always saves a little cock for Bunny.
title: NeverMore
